trainingRecap: Building – Defenders breaking lines through pass or dribble
High Press – Winning the ball, thinking, playing

gameModel.attackingOrganization: Break lines through, around, or over. Move beyond, below, and beside the ball to create options. Be composed, fast, and sharp.
gameModel.defensiveOrganization: Press high when we can. In our half, stay compact. In the box: fill space, find your mark, and clear big. Everyone defends.
gameModel.defensiveTransition: React fast, recover hard, regroup quickly. Win it back or slow them down.
gameModel.attackingTransition: Secure the ball first. If the break is on, go fast. If not, keep it and build with control.
